title: Namameki wafuku tsuma no chitai
overview: Satsuki, a wife who was suffocating in life with her husband who worked from home, returned to her parents' home in Kumamoto for the first time in a while. So I decided to call a business trip host just on a whim. On the other hand, her husband, Takahiro, did not go well and began to devote himself to a part-time job as a business trip host.
